reasoning_log: The matching process relied on identifying unique room types and specific features mentioned in the tags. Public facilities (Lobby, Gym, Parking) were matched immediately (Desc 6, 7, 8 to Images 6, 7, 8). Bathrooms were differentiated by the presence of a bathtub (Desc 5 -> Image 5, featuring a tub and wooden ceiling) versus a dedicated shower stall (Desc 3 -> Image 3). The bedroom (Desc 4) was uniquely identified by its wood floor, AC unit, and built-in storage (Image 4). The three living room descriptions (Desc 1, 2, 9) were matched based on perspective: Desc 9 explicitly mentions the '書櫃平台' (bookshelf platform) and '另一角度' (another angle), aligning with Image 9 which highlights this unique feature and the wall decal. Desc 1 was assigned to the main, wide living room view showing the balcony (Image 1). Desc 2, focusing on '動線區' (flow/circulation), was assigned to Image 2, which captures the central axis and transition area of the apartment.

matching_result_list.evidence: Wide view of the main living room showing the balcony access and extensive built-in storage, matching the primary '客廳' description.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(大面落地窗與側窗), 通風良好(雙向開窗+陽台門), 規則格局(長方形空間好擺家具), 天花高度舒適(無壓迫感梁柱), 收納完善(電視牆與櫃體一體成型), 已裝修可立即入住(木作與磁磚地坪完成), 有陽台(客廳外連接可晾曬與休憩), 地板易清潔(拋光磚適合家庭與寵物)

matching_result_list.evidence: Image focuses on the central flow path and open space, showing the transition from the living area (TV wall) into the hallway, matching '客廳/餐廳動線區' and '動線順暢'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 空間開闊(客餐廳一體大坪數), 採光不錯(前後皆有窗戶反射光線), 動線順暢(入口至各房與陽台清楚分區), 收納櫃體充足(側邊整排木櫃), 已有電視牆配置(預留線路與設備位), 天花燈具完整(嵌燈與軌道燈已裝設), 地坪平整好利用(大面磁磚適合多種家具配置)

matching_result_list.evidence: Standard guest bathroom featuring a fully enclosed glass shower stall, confirming '乾濕分離' (wet/dry separation).

extracted_feature.raw_description: 乾濕分離(玻璃拉門淋浴間), 採光通風可(浴室有窗戶), 衛浴設備齊全(馬桶與面盆完整), 清潔狀況尚可(磁磚牆地無明顯霉斑), 空間中等(活動轉身尚算方便), 安全性尚可(止滑感較好的小尺寸地磚)

matching_result_list.evidence: The only bedroom image, featuring wood flooring, extensive system storage cabinets, and a visible AC unit, matching '臥室一' tags.

matching_result_list.evidence: Master bathroom identified by the presence of a bathtub and the distinctive wooden ceiling ('天花木作保溫感佳').

matching_result_list.evidence: Clear depiction of an indoor parking garage with marked spaces, matching '室內平面車位'.

matching_result_list.evidence: Focuses on the unique raised platform/desk area and adjacent storage, matching '客廳(另一角度)' and the specific tag '起居區與書櫃平台分區明確'.

tag_list: 起居區與書櫃平台分區明確
extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光與視野佳(大落地窗連接陽台), 起居區與書櫃平台分區明確(架高木平台創造閱讀或遊戲區), 格局方正好規劃(客廳寬度足夠), 收納空間豐富(側牆櫃與平台下可能有收納), 適合親子活動(開放空間+平台區可作遊戲區), 地面磁磚反光良好(增加室內亮度)
